item.title: Python BDD Framework – Behavior
item.dc:creator: kaushik
item.description:
BDD A behavior is how a feature operates within a well-defined scenario of inputs, actions, and outcomes. One of the most common behavior spec languages is Gherkin. Test frameworks can easily automate these behavior specs by “gluing” step texts to code implementations. Products can exhibit countless behaviors, such as: Submitting forms on a website Searching …
